announcements.title: New Branch Opening
announcements.summary: Announcing the opening of our new branch in Kuala Lumpur.
announcements.content: We are excited to announce the opening of our new branch in Kuala Lumpur, which will be operational from February 2024. This expansion is a part of our commitment to providing better services to our customers in Malaysia.
announcements.htmlText: We are excited to announce the opening of our new branch in Kuala Lumpur, which will be operational from February 2024.
